means: 银器，镀银器皿（尤指餐具）

sentence.Network_en: Everton paraded their recently acquired silverware.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃弗顿展示了他们最近获得的银杯。

sentence.Network_en: Moisture leads to the tarnish of the silverware.
sentence.Network_cn: 湿气使得银器毫无光泽.

list.abs: Chelsea boss Jose Mourinho says he is & quot ; no longer the Special One & quot ; and is only one an elite group of managers who always challenge for silverware .教练何塞·穆里尼奥说自己“不再是一个非凡的人”，而只是精英教练中的一人，这些精英教练都一直在挑战更多的荣誉。
Ican never guarantee we will win silverware , but I can promise we will all be working as hard as possible to make our collective ambitionscome true .我从不保证我们会赢取奖杯，但是我可以保证我们会努力工作，让我们的共同理想成为现实。
they had much silverware at that time ., 那时他们拥有很多银器.
americans do not use silverware for eating bread ., 美国人不用银器吃面包.

entry.def: You can use silverware to refer to all the things in a house that are made of silver, especially the cutlery and dishes.

example.ex: There was a serving spoon missing when Nina put the silverware back in its box.
example.tran: 尼娜将银餐具收拾到盒子里去的时候发现少了一把调羹。

entry.tran: (新闻用语中有时指体育比赛中的)银杯
entry.def: Journalists sometimes use silverware to refer to silver cups and other prizes won by sports teams or players.

example.ex: Everton paraded their recently acquired silverware.
example.tran: 埃弗顿展示了他们最近获得的银杯。

means.word_mean: 1. tableware made of silver or silver plate or pewter or stainless steel
